caption.p:
Rb3 suppressed the TGF- β expression evoked by CPT in kidney tissue of xenograft nude mice. (a) Immunohistochemistry for TGF- β expression in kidney tissue. (b) Quantitative analysis of TGF- β expression by immunohistochemistry. (c) Western blotting for TGF- β expression in kidney tissue. (d) Quantitative analysis of TGF- β expression by Western blotting.
∗
p < 0.05 and
∗∗
p < 0.01 compared to the control group; # p < 0.05 compared to the CPT group.
